H0.text: Air, water, and food are the three things that animals need to live and survive.

H1.text: Air, water, and socialization are the three things animals need to live and survive.

H2.text: Sex, water, and sleep are the three things animals need to live and survive.

H3.text: Water, food, and an ecosystem are the three things animals need to live and survive.

A4.text: All forms of life require carbon, energy, and water as well as various other molecules.

A5.text: Animals require complex nutrients such as carbohydrates, lipids, and proteins, obtaining them by consuming other organisms.
